virtual

adds an edge to the Graph, that is, a connection between two vertices

Time Complexity:
O(log|E|)
Parameters
eedge to be added
Returns
'true' if the insertion occurs, 'false' otherwise

Reimplemented in DGraph, and UGraph.

int  dest,
double  weight,
bool  valid 
)
virtual

adds an edge to the Graph, that is, a connection between two vertices

Time Complexity:
O(log|E|)
Parameters
srcindex of the source vertex
destindex of the destination vertex
weightcost of the connection
validbool that indicates if the edge should be considered in Graph traversals
Returns
'true' if the insertion occurs, 'false' otherwise

Reimplemented in DGraph, and UGraph.

std::list< int > Graph::bfs ( int  src)
protected

implementation of the Breadth-First Search algorithm, which traverses the graph

Time Complexity:
O(|V| + |E|)
Parameters
srcindex of the vertex where the algorithm will start
Returns
list containing the indices of all the visited vertices

)
protected

implementation of the Breadth-First Search algorithm, which finds ALL the shortest paths between two vertices in a Graph

Time Complexity:
O(|V| + |E|)
Parameters
srcindex of the source vertex
destindex of the destination vertex
Returns
list containing all the shortest paths that unite the two vertices

◆ diameter()

double Graph::diameter ( std::list< std::pair< int, int > > *  farthest = nullptr)

computes the maximum distance between any two vertices in the Graph

Time Complexity:
O(|V| * (|V| + |E|))
Parameters
farthestlist where the indices of the farthest vertex pairs will be inserted
Returns
pair containing the diameter and the two vertices that define it

O(|V| * |E|^2)
Parameters

◆ getReachable()

std::list< int > Graph::getReachable ( int  src,
double  dist,
bool  weighted = true 
)

calculates which vertices can be reached in a given distance from a source vertex, using an implementation of the Breadth-First Search algorithm

Time Complexity:
O(|V| + |E|)
Parameters
srcindex of the source vertex
distdistance
weightedbool that specifies if the given distance is referring to the weight of the edges ('true') or the total number of edges ('false')
Returns
list containing the indices of the reachable vertices

Returns

◆ getShortestPaths()

std::list< Path > Graph::getShortestPaths ( int  src,
int  dest 
)

calculates ALL the shortest paths between two vertices

Time Complexity:
O(|V| + |E|)
Parameters
srcindex of the source vertex
destindex of the destination vertex
Returns
list containing the shortest paths (each path is represented by the indices of the vertices that form it)
